events.title: Kitagawa returns to Antarctica to bury the dogs

movie.title: Antarctica
movie.plot: Two Japanese scientists, Ushioda and Ochi, develop a bond with their sled dogs while on an expedition in Antarctica. Ushioda and Ochi eventually leave Antarctica, only to return to search for the dogs inadvertently marooned there.
